text: CLOSE Tiffany Haddish recalls Beyonce's reaction to a woman flirting with Jay - Z USA TODAY Beyonc√© taught us in Obsessed that you do not touch her child, and according to Tiffany Haddish, she wants you to keep your hands off her man as well. In a NSFW clip for TV One's Uncensored, the comedian with an affinity for Groupon and a way with words spilled the Lemonade on how she and the great and powerful Bey met.
